claims.object: obtaining data about a physical system
collecting information about a physical system
feedback control of the physical system

surface_layer.definition: An instrumentation system obtains data about a physical system for collecting information or feedback control.

deep_layer.mechanism: Sensors measure physical parameters, signal conditioning prepares the signal, and data acquisition converts to a digital format for analysis or control.
deep_layer.origin: Developed in engineering for measurement and control applications.

epistemic_metadata.source: PDF INSTRUMENTATION AND CONTROL SYSTEMS - University of Oxford
